release_note: Hey! We want you to have the best experience with our app so this release we ve made some updates to your email inbox. We ve added a filter to show your unread emails and you can now swipe right to mark your emails as read or unread. We ve also fixed a few bugs. Thanks for using MySudo! If you need help reach out via X MySudoApp or email support mysudo.com

Now supporting MySudo Browser Extension! Securely send Sudo details to your preferred browser enabling hassle free auto fill for forms on your desktop across all your favorite sites. This release also allows you to easily share images and text directly from your device through MySudo messaging and email. And to keep the app in top shape we ve also fixed a few bugs. We hope you like it! If you need help reach out via X MySudoApp or email support mysudo.comixes the initial text focus when using reply reply all or forwarding via email.

For this release we dug deep to improve the overall calling experience within MySudo. We enhanced the user interface and squashed a bunch of bugs. We hope you like it! If you need help reach out via X MySudoApp or email support mysudo.com
Hey we like to keep the app in top shape so this release we ve fixed a few bugs. Keep enjoying MySudo and if you need help we re always here: support mysudo.com
Fixes IAP required for ACH debit cards to be used as a funding source for a virtual cards.

Hey big news for our virtual cards users: We ve introduced ACH so you can now fund your virtual cards transactions directly from your bank account instead of a debit or credit card. And to keep the app in top shape this release we also fixed a few bugs. We hope you re loving summer with MySudo! If you need help we re always here: support mysudo.com
We fixed an issue that was stopping some users from reinstalling or transferring their account to new devices. We re always here to help: support mysudo.com.

To set you up for summer MySudo s had a spring clean! Messaging now has a typing indicator and a better map pin. Copy pasting Sudo phone numbers into web forms is easier since we dropped the international code. And we freshened up the invite a friend feature so you can bring more buddies to the app. Enjoy your summer with MySudo! If you need help we re always here: support mysudo.com

In this latest release we ve hot fixed a security issue where passcode FaceID dismisses itself at app launch that related to our recent messaging update We re excited to bring you a major update to messaging. We ve made loads of small improvements that make messaging in the world s only all in one privacy app even better. In this update you ll see: our fresh new UI style gallery views for image attachments tap to resend a failed message simpler editing view better access to contacts and old message threads greater accessibility supporting larger text sizes and voiceover for screen readers. Under the hood is more robust too so expect a smoother experience all around. As always thanks for using MySudo. If you need support or want to request a feature contact us at support mysudo.com.

We re excited to bring you a major update to messaging. We ve made loads of small improvements that make messaging in the world s only all in one privacy app even better. In this update you ll see: our fresh new UI style gallery views for image attachments tap to resend a failed message simpler editing view better access to contacts and old message threads greater accessibility supporting larger text sizes and voiceover for screen readers. Under the hood is more robust too so expect a smoother experience all around. As always thanks for using MySudo. If you need support or want to request a feature contact us at support mysudo.com.
This release fixes a registration issue that affects users during onboarding or launch in several geolocations outside the US.

This release we ve introduced an important change to virtual cards. Users will need to update to this version to continue using virtual cards. And to make MySudo even better we ve fixed a few bugs. As always thanks for using MySudo. If you need support or want to request a feature contact us at support mysudo.com.

This release is a security fix that solves an issue related to setting a password for backup and restore. Thanks for using MySudo. If you need support or want to request a feature contact us as support mysudo.com.

With this release you can see whether poor network is affecting calls you make from your Sudo to non Sudo numbers. Information about our monthly plans is clearer and we have made improvements so it s even easier to find your friends on MySudo. As always thanks for using MySudo. If you need support or want to request a feature contact us as support mysudo.com.

This release we ve introduced private contact matching. If you opt in we can tell you which of your cell contacts is using MySudo so you can connect securely on the app. We ve improved messaging so most users can now reply to short codes. And to make MySudo even better we squashed a few bugs. As always thanks for using MySudo. If you need support or want to request a feature contact us as support mysudo.com.
We fixed an issue that was stopping some users from adding a funding source to their virtual cards. We re always here to help: support mysudo.com.

This release we ve really focused on improving messaging. We ve fixed an issue some users were having with sending larger files and made some other improvements. We ve fixed issues with incoming calls when Silence unknown caller is enabled too. And to make MySudo even better we squashed a few bugs. As always thanks for using MySudo. If you need support or want to request a feature contact us as support mysudo.com.

Thanks for using MySudo. This release is small but mighty. We ve made it easier for users to add their first telephone number and we ve added some important security measures to safeguard against telephone number misuse. We ve fixed a Sudo to Sudo messaging issue that was affecting some users. If you need support or have feature requests please contact us at support mysudo.com or via the MySudo Community at www.mysudo.com.

Thanks for using MySudo. It s even easier now to invite others to join you on MySudo. Simply use one of your Sudos to send a link to a friend to download MySudo and start communicating with you. We have also squashed some bugs in this release. If you need support or have feature requests please contact us at support mysudo.com or via the MySudo Community at www.mysudo.com.

Thank you for using MySudo! We update our app regularly to improve your experience.We are continuing to enhance our new Sudo Handles feature and have now added the ability to easily create a memorable handle during onboarding! All Sudo to Sudo messaging voice and video communications with your handle are private secure and E2E encrypted. This release also includes: Updates to our Plans and Plans screens regarding SudoFree Fixed Apple email verification when using MySudo email Fixed an issue with new voicemail recordings Enhanced App optimizations and smashed a few bugs! If you have any issues or feature requests please reach out to us at support mysudo.com or via the MySudo Community at www.mysudo.com.

Thank you for using MySudo! We update our app regularly to enrich your experience. We are excited to introduce the first version of Sudo Handles. Now you can create a friendly memorable handle to use for all your encrypted communications with other MySudo users. Handles are easy to remember and share. More Handles features coming soon! This release also includes: Fixes a delay sending messages and addresses a background crash when receiving messages. Fix a bug that leads to reset email accounts potentially being shown instead of the current one. If you have any issues or feature requests please reach out to us at support mysudo.com or via the MySudo Community at www.mysudo.com.

This release also includes: Improvements to QR Code account transfer between iOS and Android Fixes to calling from iOS recent call list Enhancements to links received in MySudo emails Better user feedback for calling errors when there is no network We have also made device memory and storage reduction improvements and smashed some bugs! If you have any issues or feature requests please reach out to us at support mysudo.com or via the MySudo Community at www.mysudo.com.

Thank you for using MySudo! We update our app regularly to improve your experience. The latest MySudo iOS release is available and includes: MySudo for iOS now supports Group Video Calling! Video chat with up to 5 MySudo users and enjoy end to end encryption with private and secure video calls. We squashed a few bugs along the way as well. As always if you run into any issues or have a feature request you d like to see in MySudo send us an email at support mysudo.com or post your feature request directly to the MySudo Community.

Thank you for using MySudo! We update our app regularly to improve your experience. We have made many improvements and bug fixes in this update here are the more visible ones: Introducing the ability to Silence Unknown Callers! If you don t want to receive calls from numbers that are not in your contacts you can silence them on a per Sudo basis by enabling Silence Unknown Callers in Settings Updated our backup and restore capabilities If you haven t done so already go and set a Recovery Password today in the MySudo settings so you don t lose your Sudos and data! Fixed Incoming calls now respect the call notifications settings on iPad Fixed Message status indicator ticks show correctly on sending device Fixed Save an email as draft We also nailed down a few crashes! As always if you run into any troubles or have a feature request you d like to make please send us an email at support mysudo.com or post your feature request directly on the MySudo Community.

Thank you for using MySudo! We update our app regularly to improve your experience. In this update we are excited to be introducing our secure payments capability MySudo virtual cards! In today s digital world it is paramount to protect and keep private your personal credit and debit card details from hackers trackers and bad actors. MySudo virtual cards puts you in control of your information. Virtual cards can be used to make purchases from online merchants retailers and services using the virtual card s details i.e. 16 digit card number expiration date and CVV . Using a virtual card for your purchases instead of your regular credit or debit card keeps your personal card details safe private and secure! You will find the MySudo virtual cards feature in the bottom right part of navigation bar for all your Sudo profiles. Tap the card icon and follow the steps to enable this new capability. We are currently working on more enhancements and additional funding sources for virtual cards stay tuned! You can read more about MySudo virtual cards on our website: Blog and FAQ We have made many improvements and bug fixes in this update as well here are the more visible ones: Improvements to global notifications Improvements to alert sounds and vibration when using default sounds for message and email notifications Enhancement to area code handling for messaging Improvements to browser and site handling Improvement to browser with user s whitelist domains settings being maintained after App launch Enhancement to browser enabling long press links and option to copy link Enhancement to email enabling long press links and option to copy Improvements to Select All and Read All features for email Improvements for calls from No Caller ID callers Fixes a bug in the Compare Plans screen relating to calling minutes. Improvements to App onboarding MySudo for Web session connection improvements And of course we nailed a few crashes As always if you run into any troubles or have a favourite request you d like to be featured send us an email at support mysudo.com or post your feature request directly on the MySudo Community. MySudo virtual cards only available in the U.S.

Thank you for using MySudo! We update our app regularly to improve your experience. This update includes over 40 enhancements and bug fixes including: Enable the new Ad and Tracker Blocking feature in the Private Browser to greatly enhance your privacy. Remote content in emails e.g. images no longer load automatically giving you more control over your privacy. See which Sudo profile is being called on the incoming call notification. Copy and paste images and Bitmojis directly into text messages. The number pad on the phone dialer correctly plays the touch tone during on a call. Notifications have been updated to conform with underlying iOS 13 notification changes. iPad landscape mode received multiple updates to improve the iPad experience. Several annoying crashes were fixed. As always if you run into any troubles send us an email at support mysudo.com
Thank you for using MySudo! This quick update smooths out a bump or two from the previous release. As always if you run into any troubles send us an email at support mysudo.com.

Thank you for using MySudo! We update our app regularly to improve your experience. This update includes over 50 bug fixes and tranquility enhancements including: Email zoom in zoom out improvements for easier reading Improved email security control download of remote images content Copy paste improvements of Bitmoji into messaging iOS 13 compatibility improvements Improvements on global notification handling Fixed the number pad dial tone while on call Improvements in landscape mode Incoming call notification now displays the Sudo being called As always if you run into any troubles send us an email at support mysudo.com

Thank you for using MySudo! We update our app regularly to improve your experience. We re happy to introduce landscape mode for iPad! Now MySudo is even easier to use. This update also includes over 100 bug fixes and performance enhancements! Improvements on seeing which Sudo profile is receiving a call Some of those pesky crashes were hunted down Notifications have vast improvements Sending receiving of images now has a progress indicator Ability to turn on off Privacy Tips News from Team Sudo Enjoy improved functionality and fewer bugs As always if you run into any troubles send us an email at support mysudo.com

Thank you for using MySudo! This update includes a series of fixes to ensure notifications are received when the app is closed. As always if you run into any troubles send us an email at support mysudo.com.

Thank you for using MySudo! This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements to the following: Sending photos in text messages Restoring a large MySudo account to a new device Seeing unsent text messages clearly marked as draft As always if you run into any troubles send us an email at support mysudo.com

Thank you for using MySudo! We update our app regularly to improve your experience. We re happy to introduce our full featured web browser built into MySudo. Keep your browsing history bookmarks and tabs compartmentalized by Sudo. Stay tuned for ad and tracker blocking capabilities coming soon. Browser Find the MySudo browser in the bottom right hand corner of the navigation tab Open links in text messages and emails in the MySudo browser Tap back and forth between original messages and the web page Email Compose an email and see your Sudo s first last name and email address above the subject field Expand the email header on received and sent emails to see the names and email addresses the sender and recipients Navigate to other tabs in the app when viewing an email and quickly navigate back without losing context Messages Find text message attachment buttons in the paperclip menu when composing a text message Access your device s photo library when sending a photo from a text message Tap on a notification from a different Sudo and automatically switch Sudos Navigate to other tabs in the app when viewing a text message and quickly navigate back without losing context General Swipe right to return to a previous screen finally! Find the contacts tab in the left hand menu Enjoy compartmentalized Sudo contacts when composing an email or text message to prevent accidental communication from the wrong Sudo Enjoy improved functionality and fewer bugs Got a favorite request you d like to be featured Send us an email at support mysudo.com.

Thank you for using MySudo! We update our app regularly to improve your experience. See our latest updates in response to your requests: Navigate in and out of an active call on MySudo to view content within the app See which Sudo is active when opening the Sudo Switcher View the your plans page to see exactly how many free numbers you have left Pull down on a list to search locally within messages emails and contacts Enjoy a tidy iOS Notifications Center after viewing corresponding content in MySudo Leave voicemail messages up to 90 seconds in length Enjoy improved functionality and fewer bugs Got a favorite request you d like to be featured Send us an email at support mysudo.com.

With an improved Sudo Switcher faster launch time and a refreshed design MySudo is now better than ever! Sort your contacts by first or last name Enjoy our new almost white chat background Pull down to search within message email or contact lists Search global content by opening the left drawer menu Tap to select a Sudo card long press to copy specific Sudo details Tap the icon in the top right corner to toggle between large and small Sudo cards Know exactly how many free phone numbers you have left when deleting a phone number Enjoy improved functionality and fewer bugs Got a favorite request you d like to be featured Send us an email at support mysudo.com.

A special thanks to a helpful user for pointing out a bug affecting email replies on the iPad. Stay tuned for an exciting release just around the corner. Got a favorite bug you d like to be featured Send us an email at support mysudo.com.

Have a suggestion or bug you want to see featured above We re all ears! Send them to support mysudo.com.

We ve been listening to your feedback. See our latest updates in response to your requests: View your Sudo details while on an active call Swipe through attachments in a chat from the thread details screen See contact name with typing bubble in group messages Receive multiple push notifications at once Enjoy 58 fewer bugs and crashes! Hello from Team Sudo! We ve been listening to your feedback and we re happy to announce the addition of some of our top requested features. Here s what s new: Set a passcode or use TouchID or FaceID to secure your MySudo app. Simply open the app and go to Settings TouchID FaceID PIN toggle the setting to ON and enter your passcode. Safely backup your Sudo data! It is a simple two step process: create a password to protect your backup and then sync with iTunes or iCloud. If anything ever happens to your device your Sudo data will be restored when you set up your replacement device using iTunes or iCloud. Transfer your Sudo data to another phone using a QR code. Your Sudo data is instantly available on the other device Create custom voicemail greetings for each of your Sudo identities. To change your voicemail greetings open the app and go to Settings Choose a Sudo Voicemail Greeting and customize your own message. Choose your audio source including Bluetooth headphones during an active call. We ve also added a feature that saves your SMS drafts if you leave the chat before sending. We ve also fixed several bugs and crashes. Thanks for using MySudo! Have a favorite bug for us that you want featured above We d love to listen. Just send your feedback to support mysudo.com and we ll do our best to accommodate.

Team Sudo here with exciting updates! We re happy to announce that MySudo now supports Video Calling for all SudoIn users. All video calls are encrypted end to end to ensure that your conversations stay private and secure. To start a video call open your MySudo Contacts list choose a SudoIn contact and click on the video icon. Invite your friends to MySudo for absolutely private safe secure and FREE communications. MySudo now allows you to select from a handful of custom chat backgrounds. Simply go to your settings click on Messages and choose a wallpaper. We ve also improved MySudo s overall performance and speed updated read receipt functionality and fixed some nasty bugs. Thanks for using MySudo! If you re loving MySudo we d love a review from you. If you re not please don t hesitate to tell us at support mysudo.com A note to iOS 10 users: This is the last release that supports iOS 10. All future releases will support iOS 11 and above. So make sure you upgrade your phone!
Hello from Team Sudo! Happy to report that notification settings are now saving correctly and we ve also made a couple of crash fixes.

Team Sudo here with a couple of updates. We re happy to announce that SudoMax plan users will now be able to add up to 9 Sudo identities and phone numbers. We ve also added a couple of cool features to your Sudo identity cards. Simply click on the ellipsis to add some notes about your Sudo or easily share your Sudo identity card from the app or from your device. Lastly SudoApp users can now transfer all of their Sudo identities to MySudo. To get started make sure you ve updated to the latest version of SudoApp in the Apple App Store. Then simply open SudoApp and follow the prompts to move all of your Sudo identities to MySudo.

Team Sudo is happy to announce that MySudo is now available in France and the United Kingdom! This means that you can now create Sudo identities with custom phone numbers and emails for these countries. As an added bonus we also dropped the prices for SudoGo SudoPro and SudoMax plans for existing and new users. Woohoo!

Hello from Team Sudo! Happy to report that we cleaned up the code made a few quality improvements and fixed all of the inappropriate accidental tapping. We also introduced a new 1 year free trial for MySudo users. That means both new and existing MySudo users will get a total of 12 months to experience the power of using their Sudo identity to search shop sell and socialize in private and in control.

Hello! Team Sudo here. Taking care of a few pesky bugs and added the ability to toggle message read receipts on off in Message Settings. Have a favorite bug that you need smashed Just send your feedback to support mysudo.com and we ll get right on it. Thanks for using MySudo!
